requirement_text: The braking system shall stop the train within 800 m when the emergency brake is applied at 160 km/h on dry track.
rationale: Ensure safe stopping distance in emergency scenarios.
acceptance_criteria: Given speed = 160 km/h and emergency brake applied on dry track, then stopping distance <= 800 m in 10 consecutive runs.

requirement_text: The HMI should display the status quickly and clearly for the driver.
The infusion pump shall deliver 5 mL/h ± 5% for flow rates between 1 mL/h and 10 mL/h at 23°C with saline.
rationale: Dose accuracy requirement for patient safety.
acceptance_criteria: Given setpoint = 5 mL/h, temperature = 23°C, fluid = saline, then measured average flow is within ±5% over 60 minutes.

requirement_text: The ECU shall provide diagnostic information if needed.
acceptance_criteria: Diagnostic information includes DTC code, timestamp, and current operating mode available via UDS service 0x19 within 2 seconds after request.

requirement_text: The navigation solution shall have high accuracy during normal operation.
The navigation solution shall provide position error <= 10 m (95th percentile) in nominal flight conditions.
acceptance_criteria: Using reference trajectory, computed horizontal position error <= 10 m for at least 95% of samples over a 30-minute nominal flight profile.

requirement_text: The system shall prevent unauthorized access to admin functions.
The system shall enforce RBAC such that only ADMIN role can access admin APIs, and all denied attempts are logged with user_id, timestamp and source IP.
rationale: Ensure enforceable access control and auditability.
acceptance_criteria: Attempt admin API with roles USER/OPERATOR: access denied (HTTP 403). Attempt with ADMIN: access granted. Verify log entry contains user_id, timestamp, source IP for each denied attempt.

requirement_text: The onboard unit shall exchange messages with wayside within 200 ms.
acceptance_criteria: Under nominal radio conditions (defined in test plan), end-to-end message latency <= 200 ms for 99% of 10,000 messages.

requirement_text: The onboard unit shall exchange messages with wayside within 200 ms in all conditions.
The device shall raise an audible alarm when occlusion is detected.
acceptance_criteria: When occlusion is detected, alarm is audible.

requirement_text: The device shall raise an audible alarm within 2 seconds of occlusion detection, with sound pressure level >= 60 dBA at 1 meter.
acceptance_criteria: Trigger occlusion event  verify alarm starts <= 2 s and SPL >= 60 dBA at 1 m in quiet room per test protocol.

requirement_text: The ECU shall store at least 50 DTCs.
acceptance_criteria: Using UDS, create DTC entries  verify ECU stores >= 50 distinct DTCs and returns them via service 0x19.

requirement_text: The ECU shall store DTCs reliably.
The modem shall support data rate up to 20 Mbps.
acceptance_criteria: With signal conditions per nominal spec, measured throughput >= 20 Mbps for at least 60 seconds.

requirement_text: The modem shall support data rate up to 20 Mbps with low jitter.
acceptance_criteria: Throughput >= 20 Mbps and jitter is low.

requirement_text: The software shall be updatable in the field.
The software shall support OTA update with rollback such that if update fails, system returns to previous version within 5 minutes without loss of configuration.
acceptance_criteria: Force update failure  verify rollback completes <= 5 min and configuration checksum unchanged.

requirement_text: The system shall be safe.
The system shall demonstrate compliance with EN 50128 with evidence package including requirements, traceability, tests, and safety case artifacts.
acceptance_criteria: Evidence package is produced and reviewed with zero major non-conformities in internal audit checklist.
